item.description: Meigs Point, Hammonasset Beach in Madison is a beautiful area to take a Sunday walk.  After the walk, we will have lunch at a nearby restaurant.  There is no charge for walk.  For info, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions to  1288 Boston Post Road:  Take Rt. 9S to end, turn right onto I-95S, take Exit 62 toward Hammonasset State Park, turn left onto Hammonasset Conn., at traffic circle, take 3rd exit, destination will be on the left.  We’ll meet in the parking lot.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the parking lot.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk and Lunch
